synopsis.text: Tsukasa's husband, Nasa, is tasked with an unexpected challenge: teaching a programming class at an all-girls high school. But instead of focusing on coding, the students seek Nasa's guidance for their love troubles. Meanwhile, Tsukasa struggles to maintain her cool demeanor as she grapples with the fact that her husband is surrounded by a sea of high school girls. Will Nasa be able to navigate the complex world of teenage romance and help his students find love, or will he get lost in the equation himself? Only time will tell in this heartwarming and hilarious new anime.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
